Detailed Description

A custom Menu object which will generate the application menu based on a configuration XML file. \

 Parameters:
 * parent application
 * XML configuration file
 * icons directory path

Definition at line 25 of file menu.py.

00089         """It actually creates the Menu widgets"""
00090         # first create the menu:
00091         for i in self.MenuTree: 
00092             self.menus[self.MenuTree.index(i)][0]=tkinter.Menu(self)

00095         # recursively add the rest of the menu widget in a similar structure with self.MenuTree
00096 
00097         def recursMenus(menuname):
00098             """recursive function to add the rest of the menu widget."""
00099             # menuname is a two items like [Tkinter.Menu_Instance, [cascade_members]]
00100            
00101             for j in menuname[1]:
00102                 if len(j) == 2: # simple item j[0] is the label of the menu item; j[1] - various options
00103                     
00104                     # consider the possibility of separators:
00105                     if j[0] == "Separator" and j[1][0][1] == "Separator":
00106                         menuname[0].add_separator()
00107                     else: 
00108                         # unpack the options and names (j[1]) into a dictionary like this: 
00109                         # {"name": strvalue, "callback": strvalue, "accelerator": strvalue, "icon":strvalue}   
00110                         attr={}
00111                         for i in j[1]: attr[i[0]]=i[1]
00112                         try:
00113                             self.img.append(ImageTk.PhotoImage(Image.open(os.path.join(self.iconspath, attr["icon"]))))
00114                             menuname[0].add_command(label=attr["name"], compound=tkinter.LEFT, image=self.img[-1], accelerator=attr["accelerator"])
00115                         except:
00116                             menuname[0].add_command(label=attr["name"], compound=tkinter.LEFT, image="", self.master), accelerator=attr["accelerator"])
00117                         del attr
00118                 else: # must be a MenuSubDir (j[2] contains the items in the MenuSubDir)
00119                     j[0]=tkinter.Menu(menuname[0])
00120                     # unpack the options and names (j[1]) into a dictionary like this: 
00121                     # {"name": strvalue, "callback": strvalue, "accelerator": strvalue, "icon":strvalue}   
00122                     attr={}
00123                     for i in j[1]: attr[i[0]]=i[1]    
00124                     try:        
00125                         self.img.append(ImageTk.PhotoImage(Image.open(os.path.join(self.iconspath, attr["icon"]))))  
00126                         menuname[0].add_cascade(label=attr["name"], menu=j[0], compound=tkinter.LEFT, image=self.img[-1], accelerator=attr["accelerator"])
00127                     except:
00128                         menuname[0].add_cascade(label=attr["name"], menu=j[0], compound=tkinter.LEFT, image="", accelerator=attr["accelerator"]) 
00129                     del attr  
00130                     recursMenus([j[0], j[2]])
00131  
00132         for i in self.menus: 
00133             recursMenus(i)
